column4: I think I need some help with Upper Aps airport
I've built a stop, but it's not connected to the public stop
remake the depot on the same spot you had it
and just make a taxiway that ends in the landing way
connect the taxi with the landing
try to connect to the runway
dunno how to make it work, just build one runway to your taxiway
I'll build a new airport somewhere else
the station is public, you can use it and land on it
just make one simple airport, small, just enough to operate your planes, you can land anywere on the map, all airports are public
I just have a private one on north but if you wanna use it, us I can make it public too
Is there a list of all airports?
The station list gives only my own stations
Is it considered bad style to just pop an airport in other player's territory?
mm... well, depending if you place it on a reasonable place, but yea, you can ask first
you can attract too much players and make rail lines unprofitable sometimes
I can suggest you placing one on nightdale
I'll connect it with the main line
by tram and yyou'll get lots of passengers
and you can keep all the towns south your yourself
Is it considered bad stly to just pop new stations in other players territory?
nah, you can so it but it's not really profitable
no idea, thuis was my first network game too
I just saw noone was making business on east and took most of all eastern cities for me
byu the way, east industries are not really connected, I ignored them feel free to transport them
OK, thanks. I'll build my giant air hub near the Pottsborough public stop now
you should take all passengers form pottsbourough too
you are on red numbers at the moment
and yea, if ypou wanna take nighindale and all sothern towns it's ok, I'll take you some rail line with passengers to your hub
